titleStmt.title: Proposals for sale by subscription of four sorts of curious perspective-glasses, newly invented Propositions pour vendre par souscription quatre sortes de lunettes d'approche, nouvellement inventées.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
French version of broadside is on verso.
Reproduction of original in: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library.
